analyzed: udāna
bhaddiyasutta
evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā anupiyāyaṁ viharati ambavane.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavān anupiyāyam viharati ambavane

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā bhaddiyaḥ kāḷīgodhāya putto arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api abhikkhaṇam udānam udānesi
aho sukha aho

original: Assosuṁ kho sambahulā bhikkhū āyasmato bhaddiyassa kāḷīgodhāya puttassa araññagatassapi rukkhamūlagatassapi suññāgāragatassapi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānentassa:
analyzed: assosum kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū āyasmataḥ bhaddiyassa kāḷīgodhāya puttassa arañña gatassa api rukkha mūla gatassa api suññāgāra gatassa api abhikkhaṇam udānam udānentassa
aho sukha aho
sutvāna etad ahosi

original: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho, āvuso, āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati,
analyzed: nissasayam kho āvuso āyasmā bhaddiyaḥ kāḷīgodhāya putto an abhirataḥ brahmacariyam carati

original: yaṁsa pubbe agāriyabhūtassa rajjasukhaṁ, so tamanussaramāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: pubbe agāriya bhūtassa so tam anussaramānaḥ arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api abhikkhaṇam udānam udānesi
aho sukha aho

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “āyasmā, bhante, bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: āyasmā bhante bhaddiyaḥ kāḷīgodhāya putto arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api abhikkhaṇam udānam udānesi
aho sukha aho

original: Nissaṁsayaṁ kho, bhante, āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati.
analyzed: nissasayam kho bhante āyasmā bhaddiyaḥ kāḷīgodhāya putto an abhirataḥ brahmacariyam carati

original: Yaṁsa pubbe agāriyabhūtassa rajjasukhaṁ, so tamanussaramāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: pubbe agāriya bhūtassa so tam anussaramānaḥ arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api abhikkhaṇam udānam udānesi
aho sukha aho

original: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā aññataram bhikkhum āmantesi

original: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena bhaddiyaṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehi:
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu mama vacanena bhaddiyam bhikkhum āmantehi
satthā te āvuso bhaddiyaḥ āmanteti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhaddiyaṁ kāḷīgodhāya puttaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā yena ayasmā bhaddiyaḥ kāḷīgodhāya putto tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhaddiyam kāḷīgodhāya puttam etat avoca
satthā te āvuso bhaddiyaḥ āmanteti iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho āyasmā bhaddiyaḥ kāḷīgodhāya putto tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena

original: bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ
analyzed: bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamanta

original: nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ bhaddiyaṁ kāḷīgodhāya puttaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: nisinnam khalu āyasmantam bhaddiyam kāḷīgodhāya puttam bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhaddiya, araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: saccam kira tva bhaddiya arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api abhikkhaṇam udānam udānesi
aho sukha aho
eva bhanta iti

original: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, bhaddiya, atthavasaṁ sampassamāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: kim pana tva bhaddiya atthavasam sampassamānaḥ arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api abhikkhaṇam udānam udānesi
aho sukha aho

original: “Pubbe me, bhante, agāriyabhūtassa rajjaṁ kārentassa antopi antepure rakkhā susaṁvihitā
analyzed: pubbe me bhante agāriya bhūtassa rajjam kārentassa antar pi antepure rakkhā su sa vihitā

original: ahosi, bahipi antepure rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi, antopi nagare rakkhā susaṁvihitā
analyzed: ahosi bahi pi antepure rakkhā su sa vihitā ahosi anto pi nagare rakkhā su sa vihitā

original: ahosi, bahipi nagare rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi, antopi janapade rakkhā susaṁvihitā
analyzed: ahosi bahi pi nagare rakkhā su sa vihitā ahosi antar pi janapade rakkhā su sa vihitā

original: ahosi, bahipi janapade rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi.
analyzed: ahosi bahipi janapade rakkhā su sa vihitā ahosi

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, evaṁ rakkhito gopito santo bhīto ubbiggo ussaṅkī utrāsī vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhante evam rakkhitaḥ gopitaḥ santaḥ bhītaḥ ubbiggaḥ ussaṅkī utrāsī vihāsi

original: Etarahi kho panāhaṁ, bhante, araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi eko abhīto anubbiggo anussaṅkī anutrāsī appossukko pannalomo paradattavutto, migabhūtena cetasā viharāmi.
analyzed: etarahi kho pana aha bhante arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api ekaḥ abhītaḥ anubbiggaḥ anussaṅkī anutrāsī appa ussukkaḥ pannalomaḥ para datta vuttaḥ miga bhūtena cetasā viharāmi

original: Imaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, atthavasaṁ sampassamāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesiṁ:
analyzed: imam kho aha bhante atthavasam sampassamānaḥ arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api abhikkhaṇam udānam udānesi
aho sukha aho

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi
